data.title: Join Our Team
data.meta_description: Consider joining our team at Work Training Center!
data.text:
If you are looking for an opportunity to make a difference in the lives of others and a job you can turn into a long-term career, consider joining our team at WTC!

“The work and the care that WTC puts in makes the quality of life for our clients so much better and more fulfilling for them. WTC really empowers the people we serve. The OPT and self-determination program is so important for our clients—they’re adults and just like any adult, they need age-appropriate activities. It’s gratifying to help people be included in the community, but it’s also incredibly important for the community.”
